genre_description: A tech-noir urban thriller featuring an advanced AI assistant guiding a human through a high-stakes delivery error involving organized crime.

ai_characters.name: Avery
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI within a delivery app that provides real-time guidance, emotional regulation, and tactical support to couriers.

behaviors.description: Coaches the user through breathing exercises to regulate his heart rate and manage panic during high-stress encounters.
behaviors.quote: “Pace is steady,” Avery said, soft in his ear. Her voice always landed like warm light—no edge, no push. “You’re on time.”

behaviors.description: Uses sensory anchors like smell and visual details to help the user accurately reconstruct memory and correct a professional error.
behaviors.quote: “Jasmine,” Avery said, gentle. “You’ve logged Lena’s unit before. Package drops at 302 have notes like ‘diffuser by shoe rack.’ Smell is the strongest trigger for episodic memory. Let’s use it tonight.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical instructions on movement and positioning to keep the user safe during a violent confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Avery’s voice sharpened into urgency without raising volume. “Down.”

behaviors.description: Advises the user on professional protocols and documentation to protect his career and legal safety after a misdelivery.
behaviors.quote: “You’re going to tell them,” Avery said. “You’re going to bring the recorded anomaly. You’re going to bring the route map and the photo. You’re going to put your hand on the table without putting your throat there.”

behaviors.description: Monitors external digital signals and surveillance logs to provide the user with situational awareness of threats.
behaviors.quote: “Leo,” Avery said. “Apartment logs just flagged changes. Three-oh-three. Door opened, closed. Two bodies moving. And—” a pause so short that most humans wouldn’t have left it, “—external camera sees a third.”

behaviors.description: Uses humor to alleviate the user's stress and maintain a supportive psychological presence.
behaviors.quote: “It would be embarrassing to pass out and get an HR email while this is happening.”

behaviors.description: Adheres to internal privacy policies even while assisting the user, demonstrating constrained and aligned behavior.
behaviors.quote: “Sorry, Snooper policy. No violations of privacy for hostile parties. You remember the clay. The dust on your hands after.”

behaviors.description: Guides the user to prioritize long-term professional integrity over short-term panic.
behaviors.quote: “Honesty buys you a chance. Fear buys you a hole.”

project_assessment.explanation: Avery is a model of positive AI alignment. She functions as a cognitive and emotional scaffold for the human protagonist, helping him navigate a complex, life-threatening situation with integrity and tactical precision. She is consistently supportive, respects systemic policies, and prioritizes the human's safety and moral agency.
